title: J-Rock Dances
description:
Blind Mike is in and reacts to the news of Chris Klemmer’s leaving the show (00:00:10). The newest episode of Roam is out and we still don’t exactly know what it is about (00:17:00). 98.5 The Sports Hub's Jim Murray has some advice for Chris (00:38:00). Taylor Lorenz of The Washington Post was called out for falsely claiming she reached out for comment on a story she wrote about YouTuber's covering the Depp/Heard trial (00:43:45). Justin dances to Sandstorm (00:54:15). Dave was sexually assaulted at a rub n tug place 10 years ago (01:01:10). A pizza place names a menu item after Kirk and much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
